Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS_WITH_OFFER PWO INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.USER_PRICE AS UP ON PWO.PRO_ID = UP.PRO_ID #WHERE#

WITH ENABLED_CHECKER AS ( SELECT P.*,B.BRA_NAME, UP.REAL_PRICE, UP.PRICE, COALESCE (((P.PRO_PRICE - P.PRO_SALE) / P.PRO_PRICE) * 100, 0) AS DISCOUNT FROM ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS_WITH_OFFER AS P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.BRANDS AS B ON P.BRA_ID = B.BRA_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.USER_PRICE UP ON P.PRO_ID = UP.PRO_ID WHERE PRO_ENABLED = TRUE ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ENABLED_CHECKER EC INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.PRO_GENDER AS G ON EC.PGE_ID = G.PGE_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.CATEGORIES AS C ON EC.CAT_ID = C.CAT_ID #WHERE#

WITH complete_overview AS ( SELECT p.*, COALESCE(((up.PRICE - up.SALE_PRICE) / up.PRICE) * 100, 0) AS DISCOUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORD_LINES AS ol WHERE ol.pro_id = p.pro_id ) AS AMMOUNT_OF_SALES, up.PRICE, up.SALE_PRICE, up.REAL_PRICE FROM PRODUCTS_WITH_OFFER AS p INNER JOIN user_price up ON p.pro_id = up.pro_id WHERE pro_enabled = true ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM complete_overview co #WHERE# #ORDER#
